General.Name: Eduspec Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Eduspec Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, develops and provides education technology products and services in Malaysia, Singapore, and Thailand. The company is involved in the provision of information technology (IT) consultancy and development, and other IT and computer related services, as well as technical maintenance support services; computer training; child enrichment programs; trading of computer and computer peripherals; and research, development, and trading of educational software and technical books. It distributes IT related products; markets and distributes software solutions; operates virtual schools and learning centres; develops, deploys, and supports mobile and server software applications; and markets and operates robotics for school programs and other related enrichment programs. In addition, the company is involved in the training of education tools and programs; provision of education solutions and training; provision and operation of IT learning for the pre-school market and related activities; and design, development, and marketing of the Esekolah application to facilitate and implement the productization of the school management system, and marketing and promotion of the solution to the educational industry. Eduspec Holdings Berhad was founded in 1984 and is based in Shah Alam, Malaysia.
